languages.text: {n}Голос Соломона звучит враждебно, словно вы — источник всех его бед.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの口調には、あたかもすべての苦難の原因があなたにあるかのように、敵意しか感じられなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの口調には、あたかもすべての苦難の原因があなたにあるかのように、敵意しか感じられなかった。{/n}
{n}ソロモーンの口調には、敵意と嫌悪しか感じられなかった。まるで忌まわしい虫けらに話しかけているかのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Ton vermittelt nur Feindseligkeit, als würde er dir an all seinen Nöten die Schuld geben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Ton vermittelt nur Feindseligkeit, als würde er dir an all seinen Nöten die Schuld geben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne percevez que dégoût dans le ton de Solomorne, comme s'il vous rendait responsable de tous ses malheurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne percevez que dégoût dans le ton de Solomorne, comme s'il vous rendait responsable de tous ses malheurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tono de Solomorne solo encierra hostilidad, como si te culpara por todas sus penas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tono de Solomorne solo encierra hostilidad, como si te culpara por todas sus penas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的语气中充满了敌意，仿佛他遭遇的所有不幸都是你的错。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的语气中充满了敌意，仿佛他遭遇的所有不幸都是你的错。{/n}
{n}索罗蒙的语气充满了敌意与厌恶，仿佛站在他面前的是条令人厌恶的虫子一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un sesinde düşmanlıktan başka bir şey hissedemiyorsun. Tüm sıkıntıları için seni suçluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's tone conveys only hostility, as if he blames you for all his woes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un sesinde düşmanlıktan başka bir şey hissedemiyorsun. Tüm sıkıntıları için seni suçluyor.{/n}
{n}Solomorne'un sesinde düşmanlık ve tiksintiden başka bir şey hissedemiyorsun. Sanki mide bulandırıcı bir böcekle konuşuyor.{/n}
